journey.title: About Me
journey.about: Advanced Software Engineering student with one year of professional experience as a Full-Stack Developer, with knowledge in backend development (Python, JavaScript) and frontend (React, Angular, PHP). I have a strong self-taught foundation, complemented by specialized training in Python. I am seeking an opportunity that allows me to apply my technical skills, agile mindset, and capacity for continuous learning.
